difficulty.typhoon.name: Typhoon
difficulty.typhoon.description:
<r>The maximum challenge.</c>
The planet is a nightmare, survival is merely an illusion.
Nobody has what it takes.

executioner.name: Executioner
executioner.description: The <y>Executioner</c> is a mobile fighter who specializes in counting heads. Using Ion projectors, the Executioner fabricates illusions which cause foes to run away in fear, while also projecting an axe to take out the strongest enemies. Make sure to chain kills with <y>Ion Burst</c> and <y>Execution</c> to keep the damage pouring.
executioner.story:
<ul>Passenger Details:</c>
<y>[Military Class]</c>

<ul>Luggage and Equipment:</c>
Officer boarded with EXN Acting Officer carbonweave uniform, civilian-grade plated oversuit and an issued service pistol. At military checkpoint, passenger's armament was noted to have an additional under-barrel 
modification- and was cleared after an agreement was made to store it in a secure container. The passenger also cleared one ION 204X series battery customized with propulsion orifices. As a safety measure, passenger's 
technological goods were temporarily fitted with electrical auto-nullifiers and returned to them.

<b>[SECURITY RECALL]</c>

<ul>[Note E1a]</c> Several reports of Passenger making entire security checkpoint crew uneasy. Light surveillance will be required until further notice.
<ul>[Note E1b]</c> Passenger would often reply in sounds rather than speech before opting to use Universal Sign Language.
<ul>[Event E1]</c> Contracted commando performs security check in Passenger's quarters.
<ul>[Event E1a]</c> Contracted commando requests 24 hour private surveillance in hall leading to Passenger's quarters.
<ul>[Event E2]</c> Passenger asked to move tables during mealtime after another Passenger sent a formal complaint to onboard security.

mule.name: MULE
mule.description: EVERY <y>MULE</c> UNIT IS ADEQUATELY EQUIPPED AND READY FOR DUTY. BUILT WITH HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS FOR MAXIMUM WORK PERFORMANCE. THIS MODEL INCLUDES THE <y>FORAGER SET OF TOOLS</c>, PERFECT FOR <y>HUNTING</c>, <y>EXPLORATION</c> AND OTHER DANGEROUS TASKS FOR THE COMMON USER. IN ORDER TO INITIALIZE PLEASE STATE A DIRECTIVE ON SYSTEM BOOT.
mule.endQuote: ..and so it left, pistons creaking, directive unstated.
mule.story: PSA: The MULE units are neither sentient nor pets. Calling them 'Molly' will not impact the MULE unit's programming.

nemesisCommando.name: Nemesis Commando
nemesisCommando.description: The <y>Nemesis Commando</c> is a flexible character with the firepower to deal with any situation. <y>Wound</c> enemies using <y>Blade of Cessation</c> to setup for devastating damage from your other abilities. Use <y>Tactical Roll</c> to weave in and out of melee range, and turn even the most dangerous situations in your favour.
nemesisCommando.endQuote: ..and so he left, carrying new sense of humanity within.
nemesisCommando.story:
UNREGISTERED FIELD DATA LOG: DATA LAST MODIFIED ON [##090??!?] [ERROR 0x00000ce: Data Package Corrupted, viewing a restore point.]
    [Entry 1] - Patrol group just picked up a wounded straggler a few miles off from camp. Word going around is he “showed up out of nowhere,” (as if I'm buying that), what with nothing in the surrounding area to trace his origin. Regardless of the validity of their claims, a survivor's a survivor. As I'm writing this, we're carrying him back. He's certainly not making it easy on us, though, considering the sheer heft of his gear- he's lugging some unorthodox modifications to a standard Commando armor rig. It looks to be- or maybe was originally- the initial issue of the Mk. 1 model (even though I'm pretty sure they stopped producing those years ago?).
      [Entry 2] - Update- buddy's got some scarily heavy artillery on hand for a Commando unit- a rocket launcher still warm to the touch and some almost certainly alien grenades- I sure as hell haven't seen anything like them. He’s out cold right now, and from what we can tell looking through his helmet he's well-battered. His left arm seems especially stiff- his hand's clamped shut around the handle of his vibroblade. Some of us tried to get a good look at it just now, but it's almost like his fist is fused to the damn thing. Amongst other things on his person, it's thoroughly coated in this crusted black.. substance. We don't know if it was the result of a fight between a few more survivors, or evidence for some kind of self defe??!0049### [End of legible data.]
        [Entry 2a] - I dont know how much time I have left as im typing this it woke up and camp is DESTROYED people wont stop bleeding we dont even know if it was human with what it can do noone knows what to do now it went straight for Adrian we dont even know what set it off??? what did WE do to deserve all of this??? why did that THING attack U!??!?##$0959090302???! [End of legible data.]

        Th?e ga?dflies swarm thi?s nob?le beas?t as it gra?zes. Your plag??ue upon it?s surfa?ce wi?ll be undo?ne by the?se toiling hand?s.

nemesisMercenary.name: Nemesis Mercenary
nemesisMercenary.description: The <y>Nemesis Mercenary</c> was born with a special power.
nemesisMercenary.endQuote: ..and so he left, loaded up for more.
nemesisMercenary.story: I DON'T NEED NO FRIENDS I DON'T NEED NO PHONE JUST A BAG OF SEVERED HEADS AND MY NUCLEAR THRONE

technician.name: Technician
technician.description: The <y>Technician</c> is excellent at setting up and maintaining zones of enemy denial. <y>Forced Shutdown</c> can <y>forcibly lock down an area</c> when upgraded. <y>Upgrading</c> gadgets improves their effectiveness, but be careful when doing so in dangerous situations!
technician.endQuote: ..and so he left, by switching the ship off and on again.
technician.story:
<ul>Passenger Details:
<g>[Employee Class]

<ul>Employee Details:</c>
Employee contracted to work on-site for the full duration of the scheduled voyage of the UES Contact Light, to perform maintenance on machinery should technical issues arise aboard the ship. Employee qualified with 6 years of hands-on experience in software and hardware engineering.

<ul>Luggage & Equipment:</c>
Employee boarded with a Durarend welding spacesuit rated with strong vacuum resistance, and additionally leather and cloth attire made for planetary wear. Employee notified that clothes may tear in the case of a vacuum event. Security flagged the sizable wrench they held for appearing impractical for use while potentially dangerous. Upon questioning, the employee indicated that it was "custom-built ... for the toughest jobs." Following procedure, the wrench was moved to an automated lockbox in loading bay 1a. Remaining inspection of carry-ons revealed several standard-issue wrenches, 3 color-coded USBs, a 2047 model GeForm Laptop, tool boxes, and a welding tool. USBs were inspected on company-owned QPuting Disposable Computer installed with ReoVirus Detector v1.6.2. No traces of malware were detected and stored files are UPG format containing blueprints of various devices. Employee permitted to pass with no further difficulties.

<b>[SECURITY RECALL]</c>
<ul>[Event T1]</c> Employee forcibly removed from cabin during liftoff preparations when refusing to leave after conversating with ship pilot for multiple hours.
<ul>[Event T2]</c> Employee observed stealing sodas from a vending machine.
<ul>[Event T3]</c> Automated lockdown originating in loading bay 4a resolved by employee.
<ul>[Event T4]</c> Escape pod B-08 status shifted from ERROR to ALERT after the employee was requested by ship personnel to troubleshoot. Security personnel instructed to investigate.
<ul>[Event T1a] Employee additionally reported to have tampered with cabin control panel to make it "easier to cruise." Scheduled launch delayed and employee instructed to revert any modifications made.

baroness.name: Baroness
baroness.description: Trained for the front lines, and loaded tooth and nail for crowd control. Able to wipe crowds with grenades, and relocate enemies wherever she pleases, the <y>Baroness</c> has the tools for the job. <y>Don't let anything get personal</c>.
baroness.endQuote: ..and so she left, a defiant noble, expurgated.

swapNemesis.name: Nemesis Survivors
swapNemesis.description: Swap to the familiar yet twisted <r>Nemesis survivors.</c>

swapNormal.name: Normal Survivors
swapNormal.description: Swap to the regular set of survivors.

executionerX.name: Ion Burst
executionerX.description:
Rapidly shoot ionized bullets for <y>320% damage</c> each.
Gain bullets by slaying enemies.

executionerC.name: Crowd Dispersion
executionerC.description:
<y>Dash forward, fearing nearby enemies</c>.
You <b>cannot be hit</c> while dashing.

executionerV.name: Execution
executionerV.description:
Launch into the air, and slam down with a projected axe for <y>1000% damage.</c>
Each successful execution <y>reduces skill cooldowns by one second.

executionerVBoosted.name: Crowd Execution
executionerVBoosted.description:
Launch into the air, and slam down with a projected axe for <y>1500% damage,</c> <b>fearing enemies.</c>
Each successful execution <y>reduces skill cooldowns by one second.

executionerV2.name: Skullsplitter
executionerV2.description:
Throw a projected axe in a circular arc for <y>1500% damage</c> per second. <y>Critically strikes</c> against <y>feared</c> enemies.
Each successful execution <y>reduces skill cooldowns by one second.

executionerV2Boosted.name: Skullbuster
executionerV2Boosted.description:
Throw two projected axes in a circular arc for <y>1500% damage</c> per second. <y>Critically strikes</c> against <y>feared</c> enemies.
Each successful execution <y>reduces skill cooldowns by one second.

muleZ.name: INTERFERENCE REMOVAL
muleZ.description: PUNCH ENEMIES FOR <y>200% DAMAGE</c>. HOLD TO CHARGE AND SMASH THE GROUND FOR <y>1400% DAMAGE</c>.

muleX.name: IMMOBILIZE
muleX.description: FIRE A TRAP FOR <y>125% DAMAGE</c>. THE TRAP <b>SNARES</c> UP TO <y>5 ENEMIES</c> IN THE TARGETS' PROXIMITY.

muleC.name: TORQUE CALIBRATION
muleC.description: <y>SPIN FORWARD</c> FOR <y>4X100% DAMAGE</c>. THE LAST HIT <y>STUNS</c>.

muleV.name: FAIL-SAFE ASSISTANCE
muleV.description: DEPLOY A PERSONAL REPAIR DRONE FOR 8 SECONDS. THE DRONE <g>HEALS 5X7% OF YOUR TOTAL HEALTH</c>. AT FULL HEALTH, <g>GRANTS BARRIER INSTEAD</c>.

muleVBoosted.name: FAIL-SAFE ASSISTANCE 2.0
muleVBoosted.description: LAUNCH A HEALING DRONE LASTING 8 SECONDS. THE DRONE <g>HEALS 5X10% OF YOUR TOTAL HEALTH</c>. AT FULL HEALTH, <g>GRANTS BARRIER INSTEAD</c>.

muleZ.name: INTERFERENCE REMOVAL
muleZ.description: PUNCH ENEMIES FOR <y>200% DAMAGE</c>. HOLD TO CHARGE AND SMASH THE GROUND FOR <y>1400% DAMAGE</c>.

muleX.name: IMMOBILIZE
muleX.description: FIRE A TRAP FOR <y>125% DAMAGE</c>. THE TRAP <b>SNARES</c> UP TO <y>5 ENEMIES</c> IN THE TARGETS' PROXIMITY.

muleC.name: TORQUE CALIBRATION
muleC.description: <y>SPIN FORWARD</c> FOR <y>4X100% DAMAGE</c>. THE LAST HIT <y>STUNS</c>.

muleV.name: FAIL-SAFE ASSISTANCE
muleV.description: DEPLOY A PERSONAL REPAIR DRONE FOR 8 SECONDS. THE DRONE <g>HEALS 5X7% OF YOUR TOTAL HEALTH</c>. AT FULL HEALTH, <g>GRANTS BARRIER INSTEAD</c>.

muleVBoosted.name: FAIL-SAFE ASSISTANCE 2.0
muleVBoosted.description: LAUNCH A HEALING DRONE LASTING 8 SECONDS. THE DRONE <g>HEALS 5X10% OF YOUR TOTAL HEALTH</c>. AT FULL HEALTH, <g>GRANTS BARRIER INSTEAD</c>.

muleZ.name: INTERFERENCE REMOVAL
muleZ.description: PUNCH ENEMIES FOR <y>200% DAMAGE</c>. HOLD TO CHARGE AND SMASH THE GROUND FOR <y>1400% DAMAGE</c>.

muleX.name: IMMOBILIZE
muleX.description: FIRE A TRAP FOR <y>125% DAMAGE</c>. THE TRAP <b>SNARES</c> UP TO <y>5 ENEMIES</c> IN THE TARGETS' PROXIMITY.

muleC.name: TORQUE CALIBRATION
muleC.description: <y>SPIN FORWARD</c> FOR <y>4X100% DAMAGE</c>. THE LAST HIT <y>STUNS</c>.

muleV.name: FAIL-SAFE ASSISTANCE
muleV.description: DEPLOY A PERSONAL REPAIR DRONE FOR 8 SECONDS. THE DRONE <g>HEALS 5X7% OF YOUR TOTAL HEALTH</c>. AT FULL HEALTH, <g>GRANTS BARRIER INSTEAD</c>.

muleVBoosted.name: FAIL-SAFE ASSISTANCE 2.0
muleVBoosted.description: LAUNCH A HEALING DRONE LASTING 8 SECONDS. THE DRONE <g>HEALS 5X10% OF YOUR TOTAL HEALTH</c>. AT FULL HEALTH, <g>GRANTS BARRIER INSTEAD</c>.

nemesisCommandoZ.name: Blade of Cessation
nemesisCommandoZ.description:
Cut through nearby enemies for <y>120% damage</c>, <r>wounding</c> them for 6 seconds. <r>Cannot be stacked</c>.
<r>Wounded</c> enemies take an extra <y>50% damage</c> from <b>all sources.</c>

nemesisCommandoX.name: Single Tap
nemesisCommandoX.description:
Shoot an enemy for <y>200% damage</c>.
<b>Hold up to 4.</c> Reload <b>2</c> charges when <b>rolling</c>.

nemesisCommandoX2.name: Distant Gash
nemesisCommandoX2.description: Slash in a line forward for <y>90% damage</c>, <r>wounding</c> enemies for 6 seconds.

nemesisCommandoC.name: Tactical Roll
nemesisCommandoC.description:
Quickly <y>roll forward</c> a short distance.
You <b>cannot be hit</c> while rolling. <b>Hold up to 2.</c>

nemesisCommandoV.name: Flush Out
nemesisCommandoV.description:
Throw a <y>grenade</c> for <y>700% damage</c>. Hold to <b>cook</c> the grenade.
Press the <b>down</c> direction to <y>toss</c> at a low arc instead.

nemesisCommandoVBoosted.name: Cluster Bomb
nemesisCommandoVBoosted.description:
Throw a <y>grenade</c> for <y>700% damage</c>, <y>stunning</c> enemies and <y>spitting into 3</c> grenades for <y>3x150% damage.</c>
Hold to <b>cook</c> the grenade. Press the <b>down</c> direction to <y>toss</c> at a low arc instead.

nemesisCommandoV2.name: Devastator
nemesisCommandoV2.description:
Fire a rocket for <y>1000% damage</c> to a single enemy. Surrounding enemies take <y>50% damage</c> and are <y>stunned</c>.
If used <b>airborne</c>, fire <y>downward</c> at an angle.

nemesisCommandoV2Boosted.name: Spanker
nemesisCommandoV2Boosted.description:
Fire a rocket for <y>1000% damage</c> to a single enemy. Surrounding enemies take <y>50% damage</c> and are <y>scattered</c>.
If used <b>airborne</c>, fire <y>downward</c> at an angle.
<b>Hold up to 2.</c>

nemesisMercenaryZ.name: Lascerate
nemesisMercenaryZ.description: Injure enemies with your shotgun's attachment for <y>130% damage</c>.

nemesisMercenaryX.name: Quick Trigger
nemesisMercenaryX.description: Fire your shotgun, <y>stunning</c> and hitting enemies nearby for <y>600% damage</c>.

nemesisMercenaryC.name: Blinding Slide
nemesisMercenaryC.description:
Quickly slide forwards. <b>Getting hit at the start reloads your shotgun.</c> 
<b>You can attack while sliding</c>.

nemesisMercenaryV.name: Devitalize
nemesisMercenaryV.description:
Target the weakest enemy in front of you, attacking them for <y>850% damage</c>, dealing <y>+50% TOTAL damage</c> to <y>stunned</c> enemies.</c> 
<b>You cannot be hit for the duration</c>.

nemesisMercenaryVBoosted.name: Absolute Devitalization
nemesisMercenaryVBoosted.description:
Target the weakest enemy in front of you, attacking them for <y>1100% damage</c>, dealing <y>+50% TOTAL damage</c> to <y>stunned</c> enemies.</c> 
<b>You cannot be hit for the duration</c>.

technicianZ.name: Fine Tune
technicianZ.description:
Strike forward with a wrench for <y>180% damage.
<y>Hitting gadgets</c> 3 times <b>temporarily upgrades them</c> for 30 seconds.

technicianZ2.name: Troubleshoot
technicianZ2.description:
Throw a wrench forward, piercing up to 3 enemies for <y>180% damage.
<y>Hitting gadgets</c> 3 times <b>temporarily upgrades them</c> for 20 seconds.

technicianX.name: Forced Shutdown
technicianX.description:
Toss out a bomb dealing <y>400% damage</c> on reactivation.
<y>Stuns</c> and passively pulls in enemies when <b>upgraded.

technicianXD.name: The Red Button
technicianXD.description:
Detonate the dropped bomb for <y>500% damage.</c>
<y>Stuns</c> enemies when <b>upgraded.

technicianC.name: 24/7 Energy
technicianC.description:
Deploy a <b>vending machine</c> that gives a <b>movement</c> and <y>attack speed bonus.</c>
Additionally increases <y>critical strike chance</c> when <b>upgraded.

technicianC2.name: Radial Amplifier
technicianC2.description:
Deploy an <b>antenna</c> that deals <y>15% additional damage</c> to attacked enemies.
Has <y>100% critical strike chance</c> when <b>upgraded.

technicianV.name: Backup Firewall
technicianV.description:
Place a turret firing forward for <y>220% damage per second.</c>
Fires rapidly for <y>350% damage per second</c> when <b>upgraded.

technicianVBoosted.name: Backup Firewall 2.0
technicianVBoosted.description:
Place a turret firing rapidly for <y>350% damage per second.</c>
Fires missiles for <y>4x100% damage</c> when <b>upgraded.

baronessZ.name: Pulling the Trigger
baronessZ.description:
Hurl MG rounds for <y>95% damage</c>. 
<lt>Vehicle:</c> fire a laser <y>increasing in damage the longer it hits</c>.

baronessX.name: Steady Target
baronessX.description: Pick up an enemy, dealing <y>100% damage</c> and disabling them. Lasts 4 seconds.

baronessC.name: Active Relocation
baronessC.description:
Summon a hovering vehicle that <b>increases movement speed</c>, <r>but strips the ability to jump or climb</c>. 
<b>Can attack while moving</c>.

baronessV.name: Saturated O-Charge
baronessV.description: Throw a grenade which seeks enemies and <y>explodes</c> for <y>3x320% damage</c>.

baronessVBoosted.name: Bursting O-Charge
baronessVBoosted.description: Throw a grenade which seeks enemies and <y>explodes</c> for <y>3x320% damage</c>.

armedBackpack.name: Armed Backpack
armedBackpack.pickup: Chance of firing a bullet behind you.
armedBackpack.description: <y>18.5%</c> <c_stack>(+6.5% per stack)</c> chance on attack to <y>fire a bullet</c> behind you for <y>150% damage</c>.
armedBackpack.story:
Being secure is always important. I don't want you to get in trouble, so please wear this whenever you go out. 'Specially in the canyons, there's a lot of thieves there!
I'll send you some extra ammunition later this year, alright?

brassKnuckles.name: Brass Knuckles
brassKnuckles.pickup: Deal extra damage at close range.
brassKnuckles.description: Deal <y>+35% damage</c> to enemies within <y>2.8m</c> <c_stack>(+1.4 per stack)</c>.
brassKnuckles.story:
We found this at the crime scene. We need to check for DNA against the rest of the evidence. I still cant believe they got away.
The back has some kind of symbol, maybe that could give us a clue. I'll be heading to the west of [REDACTED], I know someone who can help us solve the case.

detritiveTrematode.name: Detritive Trematode
detritiveTrematode.pickup: Low health enemies receive damage over time.
detritiveTrematode.description: Enemies <y>below 15% <c_stack>(+5% per stack) <y>health</c> become permanently <y>infected</c>, receiving <y>100%</c> damage per second.
detritiveTrematode.story:
Eh, this is yours.
Don't send one of those weird microscopic egg hatcheries EVER again, please.

dormantFungus.name: Dormant Fungus
dormantFungus.description: Regenerates <g>2%</c> <c_stack>(+2% per stack)</c> of your health every two seconds while <g>moving</c>.
dormantFungus.story:
When you commanded me to explore the fungal caves all I expected to find was.. well, fungi, of course. Though I wasn't excited by any means, this specimen caught my eye.
It seems to only grow around flowing water, and ever since I collected and contained this sample, both the colouration and the smell faded out quickly.

I hope you can study it further.

fork.name: Fork
fork.destination:
Antima Building - Rooftop,
Blossom Hills,
Earth
fork.story:
Surprise! A fork! Hahaha!!!
You said any gift was a good gift, HERE YOU GO! Jokes aside, this fork is magical. Trust me Duncan, I once got to eat a salad with it and later that same day I found a cent!
Also uh please come play with us someday soon, we miss destroying your build in SS2 (please tell me you changed your main, lol).

watchMetronome.name: Watch Metronome
watchMetronome.pickup: Charge the watch by standing still. Move faster at full charge.
watchMetronome.description: Standing still charges the watch over <b>3</c> seconds. At full charge, increase <b>movement speed</c> by <b>50%</c>, consuming charge over <b>3 <c_stack>(+1 per stack)</c> seconds.
watchMetronome.story:
Grandpa gave me this as a relic of the past. He says it belonged to our great-great-great-great-great grandfather. I couldn't care less about antiques and family belongings so I think it's best if you have it instead.
Not like it's of any use anyways..

wonderHerbs.name: Wonder Herbs
wonderHerbs.description: Increases <g>healing</c> from all sources by <g>12%</c> <c_stack>(+12% per stack)</c>.
wonderHerbs.story:
Rikka! I heard you're working with the EC on making a new recipe. Here at the farm we've been growing some special herbs which we think may come handy. They're known for being very, very useful for treating physical and emotional wounds.
If you need some more don't hesitate to call me! XOXO
- Eden

coffeeBag.name: Coffee Bag
coffeeBag.pickup: Activating an interactable boosts movement and attack speed.
coffeeBag.description: Activating an interactable <y>increases movement and attack speed</c> by <b>22%</c> for <b>10 <c_stack>(+5 per stack) <b>seconds</c>.
coffeeBag.story: Sleeeeeeeeeeepyheaaaaaaaaaaaaaaad idk why u say u dont like coffee its so gooooood for staying up. ik ik theres other other ways to get hyped but oh boy i think u will dig this one, its my favorite!!! give it a try before yelling at me mmkay?

x4Stimulant.name: X4 Stimulant
x4Stimulant.pickup: Decrease secondary skill cooldown, and heal slightly when using it.
x4Stimulant.description: Decrease your <b>secondary skill cooldown</c> by <b>10%</c> <c_stack>(+10% per stack)</c>. Using your secondary skill increases <g>health regeneration</c> by <g>2 <c_stack>(+1 per stack) <g>hp </c>per second for 3 seconds.
x4Stimulant.destination:
Romeo 33,
Batang Ai National Park,
Earth
x4Stimulant.story:
Encased, including manual. Does the machine show symptoms of a 540? If so you may want to avoid using above 100ml of stimulant.

Cheers.

moltenCoin.name: Molten Coin
moltenCoin.pickup: Chance to ignite enemies on hit and gain gold
moltenCoin.description: <y>6%</c> chance on hit to <y>incinerate enemies for 6 seconds, dropping $1 <c_stack>(+$1 per stack)<y> gold</c>.
moltenCoin.story:
Hey! Uh, I'm sorry, I'm really sorry.. I know you really wanted me to keep this coin but I can't take the responsibility any more..
See, I accidentally put the coin at the edge of a plasma furnace so.. well.. it's a bit burnt on the side, please don't get mad at me..

crypticSource.name: Cryptic Source
crypticSource.pickup: Changing direction creates bursts of energy.
crypticSource.description: Changing movement direction fires <y>chain lightning</c> for <y>70% <c_stack>(+55% per stack)<y> damage</c> on up to <y>2</c> targets.
crypticSource.story: From atoms to sentient beings, everything comes from energy. However, this rather cryptic object seems to emanate energy on its own. High amounts of friction seem to trigger a chain reaction which makes it highly unstable. However, it may also be a manipulable source of (infinite?) energy. Whether this will lead us to the utopian future we crave for is completely uncertain, but this completely changes our previous thoughts about the universe.

huntersSigil.name: Hunter's Sigil
huntersSigil.pickup: Standing still creates a zone that increases armor and critical strike chance.
huntersSigil.description: After standing still for 1 second, create a <y>small zone</c> that buffs you and allies for <b>15 <c_stack>(+10 per stack)<b> armor</c> and <y>25% <c_stack>(+20% per stack)<y> critical chance</c>.
huntersSigil.story:
Hey Sett, welcome to the club. We've been looking for candidates and now that you're with us, we can begin working next season. We're counting on you.

-Irix out

roulette.name: Roulette
roulette.pickup: Roll a random buff every minute.
roulette.description:
Gain a <y>random buff</c>, which gets <b>rerolled every minute</c>. Possible buffs:

<spr RouletteBuffs 1>: Increase <g>max health</c> by <g>60 <c_stack>(+24 per stack)</c>.
<spr RouletteBuffs 2>: Increase <g>health regeneration</c> by <g>3.6 <c_stack>(+1.8 per stack) <g>hp</c> per second.
<spr RouletteBuffs 3>: Increase <y>base damage</c> by <y>14 <c_stack>(+5 per stack)</c>.
<spr RouletteBuffs 4>: Increase <y>attack speed</c> by <y>35% <c_stack>(+15.5% per stack)</c>.
<spr RouletteBuffs 5>: Increase <y>critical chance</c> by <y>25% <c_stack>(+10% per stack)</c>.
<spr RouletteBuffs 6>: Increase <b>movement speed</c> by <b>20% <c_stack>(+7% per stack)</c>.
<spr RouletteBuffs 7>: Increase <b>armor</c> by <b>35 <c_stack>(+14 per stack)</c>.
roulette.story: Replacement Roulette model 144Bella-1 in follow-up to the recent events that unfolded in the casino. For further inquiries, please contact us at the E-direction given by our representatives.

judderingEgg.name: Juddering Egg
judderingEgg.description: Hatch <b>1 <c_stack>(+1 per stack)</c> <b>young wurm</c> who fights with you, periodically <y>attacking surrounding enemies</c> for <y>18x80% damage</c>.
judderingEgg.story:
Another one from the breeder, this time it's a very strange specimen.
Be extremely cautious, I've heard juveniles can become highly aggressive (and lethal!) in a matter of seconds if you don't handle them correctly. Shouldn't be too long before it hatches, so you better have the structure ready for it.

uraniumHorseshoe.name: Uranium Horseshoe
uraniumHorseshoe.pickup: Increase movement speed and jump height.
uraniumHorseshoe.description: Increases <y>movement speed</c> and <y>jump height</c> by <b>10%</c> <c_stack>(+10% per stack)</c>
uraniumHorseshoe.destination:
6900,
Martian's Face Horse Care and Farm Supplies,
Mars
uraniumHorseshoe.story:
We found this weird green horse shoe on the hoof of one of our prized show horses after it mysteriously died late one night.
Our horse doctor said you guys might know something about this strange horseshoe. Just holding it makes my hand burn. Handle it with care.

blastKnuckles.name: Blast Knuckles
blastKnuckles.pickup: Your attacks explode at close range!
blastKnuckles.description: Hitting an enemy within <y>4.5m</c> also <y>blasts behind them</c> for <y>220% <c_stack>(+220% per stack) <y>damage.</c> Hold up to <y>5 charges</c>. Gain a charge every <y>3 seconds.</c>

malice.name: Malice
malice.description:
Attacks

spread to nearby enemies for 50% TOTAL damage on up to 1 (+1 per stack) target(s) within 4.2m (+1m per stack).
malice.story: Contain at all costs. This specimen can be a massive threat if not handled correctly. You don't know how much we lost already in order to keep this at bay.

manOWar.name: Man-o'-war
manOWar.pickup: Create an electric discharge on kill.
manOWar.description: Killing an enemy fires <y>chain lightning</c> for <y>100% <c_stack>(+40% per stack)<y> damage</c> on up to <y>2</c> targets.
manOWar.story:
Guys, remember the tiny guy I sent over some time ago? Well.. this one is a bit more aggressive.. although she is a funny little gal! She loves spinnin' around and watching me from inside the bottle. Man, if I hadn't rescued her, she would be in some alien stomach right now.
I kinda want to name her Ann, thoughts?

guardingAmulet.name: Guarding Amulet
guardingAmulet.description: Damage taken <b>from behind</c> you is reduced by <b>40% <c_stack>(+40% per stack)</c>.
guardingAmulet.story:
I know he's somewhere out there, I know you can find him.. but you must be persistent. By the time my soul leaves this shell, the words will be spoken and you will take my place. He will be the one to show you the path to the answers you always wanted from me.
Embrace this amulet; you will depend on it, and it will keep you from ever looking back.

distinctiveStick.name: Distinctive Stick
distinctiveStick.description: Grows a tree near Teleporters, <g>healing</c> allies within <b>10m <c_stack>(+3.75m per stack)</c> for <g>2.2%</c> of their <g>health</c> every 2 seconds.
distinctiveStick.story:
Darling, I have something special for you..
The other day on my mission, I came across this. It caught my eye because it's unlike any of the branches I've seen in my life! This branch excudes a peculiar energy. It made me feel connected to nature in a way I thought was only possible in stories! In honor of our anniversary, I'm giving it to you.
I'll arrive home soon with an even greater present. Please, don't lose faith.

balloon.name: Balloon
balloon.description: Decrease <b>gravity</c> while holding the jump button by <b>35% <c_stack>(-15% per stack)</c>. Pops when damaged. Recovers when outside of danger for <b>7</c> seconds.
balloon.story: When I was younger I used to love balloons. They're quite fun to watch in places with an atmosphere. However, this one is of special value to me, as it was of the first ones to be made out of reinforced rubber, back in the '22s. I hope you take care of it, it might cost a fortune in a few more years (if it's still floating, of course!).

iceTool.name: Ice Tool
iceTool.pickup: Gain a wall jump. Climb faster.
iceTool.description: Gain <b>1 <c_stack>(+1 per stack)<b> extra jump</c> while in contact with a wall. Increase <b>climbing speed</c> by <b>18% <c_stack>(+18% per stack)</c>.
iceTool.story:
Good day fellow hiking friend, I found the ice tool you lost last time we went to Mt. [REDACTED]. Please keep an eye out for the snow next time!
I wonder if the ice tool is still usable though, it's been through so much!

needles.name: Needles
needles.pickup: Chance to mark enemies for guaranteed critical strikes.
needles.description: <y>3% <c_stack>(+2% per stack)</c> chance on hit to <y>mark</c> enemies for <y>100% critical chance</c> against them for 3 seconds.
needles.story:
Uh.. madre dice que si puedes leer esto, es porque no eres tan torpe como pensaba, y pues eso. Esperamos que te sirvan estas agujas. Me temo que no son las que pediste, pero no hace mucha diferencia, pienso.
No recuerdo si los enviamos bien embalados. Ten cuidado.

midas.name: M.I.D.A.S
midas.pickup: Convert half of your health into gold.
midas.description: Lose <r>50% health</c>, gaining <y>$1 gold per health spent</c>, plus the cost of a <b>chest</c>.
midas.story:
"A miracle from the gods.."
You keep saying it over and over again. Are you out of your mind? You keep treating us like we're ignorant when all we tried to do was to SAVE YOU.

Do us a favour and keep it. Do whatever you want with it, we do NOT want to see you around here anymore. We do NOT want to be part of whatever is going on with you and this thing.

It's making you a greedy, souless person and I hope you know it.

strangeCan.name: Strange Can
strangeCan.pickup: Throw a can to mark an enemy. Killing it releases a toxic cloud.
strangeCan.description: Throw out a <g>peculiar can</c> that <y>intoxicates</c> the enemy with the <r>highest maximum health</c>. <y>Intoxicated</c> enemies release a <y>toxic cloud</c> on death for <y>50%</c> of the enemy's <y>maximum health as damage</c> over 5 seconds.
strangeCan.story:
These are as delicious as I told you. I just hope it doesn't crack open on the way there like the last one.
I should get a job...

whiteFlag.name: White Flag
whiteFlag.pickup: Place a white flag. Everyone around it is unable to attack.
whiteFlag.description:
Place down a white flag for <b>8</c> seconds. <b>Disables skills</c> for <r>everyone</c> within its radius.
<r>Doesn't affect</c> drones and flying enemies.
whiteFlag.story: Save this for me until I get back home, I didn't need it. In fact, we became friends! I can't wait to tell you all about it soon. It's been a long trip and an unexpected series of events. I've told them about you and they want me to invite you over the next time. How's that, huh!? Love you.

multitude.name: Multitude
multitude.approaching: A horde of enemies is approaching.

gathering.name: Gathering
gathering.description: Gold drops are doubled but they must be picked up.

stage.whistlingBasin.name: Whistling Basin
stage.whistlingBasin.story: This planet continues to hold nothing but surprises for me. Considering the actions of its denizens prior to coming here, I would never have thought such sprawling and decadent architecture could be built by such creatures. Incredibly deep ebony pillars and arches constructed of beautiful stone that rise from the ground, all adorned with carvings placed by intentional hands. All along the walls are these amazingly intricate displays of deceptively simple shapes. The most peculiarly turquoise foliage attack the structures, climbing subtly along their bases. It seems the preconceived notion of savagery I held for this planet is waning. Even still, my guard is held high. It's too soon for me to rest, despite protests from my aching muscles.
stage.torridOutlands.name: Torrid Outlands
stage.torridOutlands.story: Even with my suit, I can feel the pulsing solar rays flash down and bend the atmosphere of this god-forsaken planet. It's getting harder to keep my wits about me what with this heat, and the condensation beginning to cloud my helmet's walls won't help me either.  Although, without it, my lungs would be halfway full of all the dust and detritus I've kicked up in my wandering- 'find a silver lining' and whatnot. With the sun high in the sky, even just the idea of surveying my environment with a manner of ease is nothing more than a pipe dream. I'm finding it easy to stumble into cacti and boulders in my delirium, taking brief reprieve inside these sprawling tunnels and caves that litter the surface. With the unwieldly terrain slowing my progression, the sweat trickling along my brow towards my eyes is bound to be the least of my worries.
